description: Also a filmed report on the world premiere of "Bunny Lake Is Missing".

title: Episode #3.44
description: Also a special filmed interview from Madrid with astronaut John Glenn.

title: Caesar's Palace Week from Las Vegas

Episode dated 15 March 1967
description: Merv hosted the 45th Annual Gold Medal Photoplay Award. With awards going to Barbara Stanwyck for favorite TV actress for "The Big Valley" and David Janssen favorite TV actor for "The Fugitive" and Stefanie Powers and Noel Harrison for "The Girl From Uncle" as favorite show.

title: Episode dated 17 July 1968
description: Promoting NYC Mayor John Lindsay's Give A Damn campaign to help underprivileged young people.

title: Episode dated 2 November 1971
description: Jimmy Dean discuss being on the same episode of "Sunday Night at the London Palladium" in England when Sergio Franchi was discovered by Norman Luboff.

title: Episode dated 1 February 1974
description: Host Merv Griffin devotes this special 90 min. episode of his show to the box office sensation of 1974, "The Exorcist", spotlighting the cast and director William Friedkin.
